markdownRemark.html: This mall is located in the very heart of Córdoba city. For those eager to spend some money, national and international brands have branches in Patio Olmos. There are also cinemas, a play area, and an eating lounge with quite a varied amount of restaurants on offer.

frontmatter.title: Patio Olmos
frontmatter.description: Patio Olmos - This mall is located in the very heart of Córdoba city. For those eager to spend some money, national and international brands have branches in Patio Olmos. There are also cinemas, a play area, and an eating lounge with quite a varied amount of restaurants on offer.
frontmatter.address: Av. Vélez Sarsfield 361, X5000JJD Córdoba, Argentina
